content: Intellectual Property中文 Nankai University HomeGuideOverviewCollections DistributionLibrary BuildingsCentral LibraryYifu LibraryWenzhong LibraryEconomics Branch LibraryOpening TimeRulesOrganization ChartContact UsResourcesRare books & Special CollectionsBooks/JournalsE-Books/E-JournalsChao Xing E-BooksDatabasesTheses & DissertationsForeign Teaching Materials CenterMultimedia ResourcesInstitutional RepositoryServicesBorrowLibrary CardBorrowing RulesInterlibrary LoanSpacesMultimedia ServicesSpace and Seat ReservationOnline EducationSelf-Service PrintingInformation ServicesIntellectual PropertyNovelty SearchSubject ServicesSubject ServicesDisciplinary Analysis ReportCulture PromotionExhibitionOnline ExhibitionExhibition ApplicationLibrary HistoryHistory of Library BuildingsSuccessive CuratorsCollection MarkServicesBorrowSpacesInformation ServicesIntellectual PropertyNovelty SearchSubject ServicesCurrent position：homepage  Services  Information Services  Intellectual PropertyIntellectual PropertyIntellectual Property    In July 2018, NKU Intellectual Property Information Service Center was established and attached to Nankai University Library. The non-physical center is a part of the patent and intellectual property service management system of Nankai University. The center has one director and two deputy directors appointed by the University.    Based on the Sci-tech Novelty Retrieval Workstation certified by the State Ministry of Education, the Intellectual Property Information Service Center of Nankai University has formed an excellent information service team and talent echelon.
